basics.name: Swapanali Dhend
basics.label: Associate Consultant
basics.summary: 7+ years of experience in Analysis, Design, Coding, Testing, Database Administrator & Production Support of application software in Mainframe platform. Extensive hands on experience on IBM Mainframe Application programming using COBOL II, CICS, JCL, DB2, VSAM, UNIX. CERTIFICATIONS: IBM Certified z/OS Database AdmiN, DB2 Application Developer and DB2 UDB V8 family Fundamentals Certifications.
